data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Fontoura, Paulo, Rubal, Marcos, Veiga, Puri (2017): Two new species of Tardigrada (Eutardigrada: Ramazzottiidae, Macrobiotidae) from the supralittoral zone of the Atlantic Iberian Peninsula rocky shores. Zootaxa 4263 (3): 450-466, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4263.3.2|4 occurrences
